text: Robot: Do you want some hot tea?
translation: 機器人：你要喝點熱茶嗎？

text: Dragon: No thanks. I want some meat.
Robot: Look! I found a giant peach.
translation: 機器人：看！我發現了一顆巨大的桃子。

text: Dragon: Yum! But it has a hard shell.
translation: 恐龍：好耶！但它有個硬殼。

text: Robot: I wish we had a hammer.
translation: 機器人：真希望我們有個槌子。

text: Dragon: I can just use my big feet!
translation: 恐龍：我可以直接用我的大腳！

text: Robot: Be careful! Don't feel any pain.
translation: 機器人：小心點！別受傷了。
